list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: mark (letters, words, or other symbols) on a surface, typically paper, with a pen, pencil, or similar implement.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he wrote his name on the paper
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy đã viết tên của mình trên tờ giấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: compose, write, and send (a letter) to someone.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I wrote a letter to Alison
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã viết một lá thư cho Alison

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: compose (a text or work) for written or printed reproduction or publication; put into literary form and set down in writing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I didn't know you wrote poetry
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi không biết bạn đã viết thơ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: enter (data) into an electronic or magnetic storage device, or into a particular location in a computer’s file system.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: files can be read and written directly into the file system
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các tệp có thể được đọc và ghi trực tiếp vào hệ thống tệp
